body_html:
But gcc 6.4.0 is currently the earliest version of gcc in Debian Testing (at least on our internal workstations), so I cannot compile TensorFlow otherwise.

If you're blocked, you may want to try using the version of clang that TF offers to build with. @ilya-biryukov can help if you run into problems.

Anyway, this is a dupe of #18402.

body:
> But gcc 6.4.0 is currently the earliest version of gcc in Debian Testing (at least on our internal workstations), so I cannot compile TensorFlow otherwise.

If you're blocked, you may want to try using the version of clang that TF offers to build with.  @ilya-biryukov can help if you run into problems.

Anyway, this is a dupe of #18402.
